data.name: type
data.description: Specifies the type of alert, which affects its color and icon.

data.name: theme
data.description: Determines the overall appearance theme of the alert.

data.name: variant
data.description: Specifies the structural style of the alert.

data.name: rounded
data.description: Defines the border-radius of the alert, providing control over its rounded corners.

data.name: dismissible
data.description: Makes the alert dismissible by adding a close button.

data.name: hideIcon
data.description: Hides the icon part from the alert.
